DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to identify the serial changes in lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS), urine flow and bladder voiding efficiency after transobturator tape (TOT) surgery for treatment of female stress urinary incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: Serial Changes in Micturition Symptoms, Urine Flow and Bladder Voiding Efficiency Following Transobturator Tape Surgery
DOC.criteria: women who underwent transobturator tape surgery for treatment of female stress urinary incontinence any urinary tract infection pregnancy bladder malignancy postoperative followup of less than 12 months
